name: Card TCG Unity Game Engine
description:
Card Game Engine written in C #
and based on design patterns. Unity-package

SOLID methodology. Extended abstraction layer.
Divided into assemblies.
Applied patterns: Composite, Facade, Observer, Flyweight, Static class (Singleton) and more.
Attached technical and graphic documentation.
